jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
- Developing web and mobile applications for the HCM platform and it modules using ExtJS with MVC/MVVM architecture and native JS (feature development, bug fixes and legacy code support).
- Participation in the development of a new product design.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
as Frontend Developer (2013 - 2020)
- Developing frontend for the hybrid cloud management platform with ExtJS and native JS.
- A little bit of backend development.
- Making code reviews.
- Working within a separate frontend-team according to Kanban methodology as well as in cross-functional teams working in accordance with Agile.
as UX Designer (2019 - 2020)
- Reforming technical processes and design process workflow, implementation of controllable stages in design process, extending a design toolkit.
- Mentoring and supervisory of a graphic designer's work (forming his tasks pool; planning; reviews). - Design specifications development; creating guides for developers.
- Creating mockups and prototypes.
- Product audience analysis â€” investigating user goals and preferences.
